solution_line_template: Faith must pay ${cake_stand_cost} + ${flour_cost} = $<<{cake_stand_cost}+{flour_cost}={total_cost_items}>>{total_cost_items} for the flour and cake stand.
Her two ${value_of_20_bill} bills amount to ${value_of_20_bill} x {num_20_bills} = $<<{value_of_20_bill}*{num_20_bills}={total_from_20_bills}>>{total_from_20_bills}.
So, she gave the cashier a total of ${total_from_20_bills} + ${loose_coins} = $<<{total_from_20_bills}+{loose_coins}={total_paid}>>{total_paid}.
